1.0.name: wordpress/wp-e-commerce-call-for-price
1.0.description: This is a WP e-Commerce plugin that allows you to hide the price of a specific product and replace it with a message asking your customers to call for price. The plugin is easy to use and configure. There there 15 "Call for Price" icons available as well as an ability to upload custom "Call for Price" icons. Install it, Configure it and Rock it.
